result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

11:29 AM Apprs: CO: S. Needham, Rpr: V. Kasten, Clerk: Christianson. Prosecuting attorney Brian Thomas Smestad in court for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney Abrianna Dolfi in court for Michael Jon Heil. Defendant Michael Jon Heil in court. Court reviews case. S/T Officer Kostick. Direct by Atty Smestad. Record to reflect the identification of DE. Cross by Atty Dolfi. Court finds probable cause that a felony was committed and the DF probably committed that felony and binds over for trial. ARGN: Court informs Defendant of charges, possible penalties and rights. Defendant understands. Enter NG Plea. Court orders State to provide Discovery within 20 days of today. Motions to be filed within 10 days post receipt of Discovery. Court notes if agreement, Atty Dolfi to contact JA and reschedule for Plea. DE updates address. Adjourned 11:50 AM
Status conference scheduled for November 10, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Status conference on November 10, 2022 at 09:30 am.

9:28 AM Apprs: CO: S. Needham, Rpr: V. Kasten, Clerk: B Harris, Prosecuting attorney Brian Thomas Smestad in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Michael Jon Heil appeared by video, in custody in Eau Claire County Jail.  Attorney Abrianna Dolfi in court for Michael Jon Heil. Court reviews file and notes PH has not been held at this time.  Atty Dolfi believes DE will be released from jail by end of August, requesting to set PH after that.  Court questions DE and confirms. Court questions DE on address, DE states he's homeless.  Clerk to send notice to jail. Adjourned at 9:37 AM. bph

08:18 AM  Apprs: CO: S. Needham, Rpr: V. Kasten, Clerk: K. Anderson, ADA: Brian Smestad, DF ATTY:  Abrianna Dolfi, DF: Michael Jon Heil did not appear. Set for STC. 01:35 PM  Apprs: CO: S. Needham, Rpr: Kasten, Clerk: Lindabaur. ADA:  Erica Ellenwood   DF ATTY:  Travis Satorius for Abrianna Dolfi   DF:  Michael Jon Heil did not appear. Set for INIT. Court reviews file and notes DE previously appeared by Zoom from Eau Claire Co Jail. Atty Satorius thought DE was appearing by Zoom. Recalled at 1:52 PM DF: Michael Jon Heil appeared by Zoom from Eau Claire County Jail. All other appearances as previously stated. DE updates address and will be released tomorrow from Eau Claire County Jail. Court will have bond and notice faxed to Eau Claire County Jail. Court informs Defendant of charges, possible penalties and rights. Defendant understands. Waive reading. Bond argument; bond ordered. Waive speedy prelim. Court sets PTC and will allow DE to appear by Zoom if he is in treatment.  gll  Status conference scheduled for June 13, 2022 at 08:15 am.
Status conference on June 13, 2022 at 08:15 am.

It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, Colin S.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, social media including but not limited to texting, Facebook, Twitter, contact through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

If the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bail jumping.
